resources.string: Shows a notification when SmartLyrics finds lyrics for a song playing.
We need your permission to store and read saved lyrics from your device
Header background image for this song
Songs album cover, tap to save lyrics to device
Start playing any song on your favorite app to see its lyrics displayed here, or use the search button on the top of the screen to search lyrics.
Press the big green button below to start downloading lyrics to all your songs.

There we go! SmartLyrics will download your lyrics on the background so you can go do something else instead of sitting here watching paint dry. You can check the progress by looking at the notification we just created or checking back here on this page of the app.
Icon indicating this lyric is already saved
SmartLyrics is downloading all lyrics for your Spotify library in the background
Shows the progress when you ask SmartLyrics to download lyrics for all your songs.

Lyrics to all of your Spotify tracks have been downloaded to your device. You can go to the Saved Lyrics page on the app drawer to browse all your downloaded songs or start playing from any music app to see its lyrics.
Shows a notification when SmartLyrics detects a song playing with matching lyrics.
An error occurred while saving this song. Please try again.
An error occurred while reading a file. Please try again.

SmartLyrics saves both the background header image and album cover image when saving a song, and for each song the header image takes up a few hundred kilobytes. Disabling this can save some space if you want to save lots of songs. To delete headers for already saved songs, click the button below.
Choose between spaced or normal romanization.
Automatically update the song when in Now Playing mode.
Automatically download and delete lyrics for songs that were added or removed from a music service you\'ve connected to.
Shining alert for new detected song
Open a menu to show more options
Lyrics and images provided by Genius
Detect songs playing on music apps and shows lyrics when in-app. Disabling this also disables the background detection service.
Automatically romanize song title, album, artist and featured artist.
This will only keep the romanized titles in search results and hide the original Japanese text. Gives a cleaner look.
An error occurred, please reload the song
